page.title: 05FARMS IN AREA
page.content:
There are two main farms,{BULSE}farm in Wendens Ambo and{WENDEN}farm.Bulse farm is owned by Mr Denham.It is situated in Rookery Lane,Wendens Ambo.The farm dates from the 18th century,but has only been owned by Mr Denham for the last 17 years.There are no animals on the farm,only a scattering of chickens and geese.Most of the land is drained naturally and some is drained by ditches.The farm has 4 tractors and 1 combine harvester. Main crops; wheat & barley. Wenden farm is situated by the Parish Church and the Bulse farm.It too dates back to the 18th century.Also the farm lies on chalky boulder clay as does most of Wendens Ambo.The farm is owned by Mr.Yale and is devoted to{ARABLE}and Pig farming.
By Andrew Heath & Daryl Owen.
